name: Bouncy Red Ball Game
description:
Now there is another Challenging Game with new and amazing features.
Your enemy is Angry Red Ball. Red ball is bouncing here and there. Your task is to keep save animals from red ball. With every save you will find one coins or other rewards...

Red balls will be twice in number when you play with good way.

How To Play

Tap to change direction.
3D touch to dash.
Download this amazing game and enjoy.....
thanks..
